metadata.title: Solution and tools: What type of Voice control applications is this device suited for?

sections.content:
Question:
What type of Voice control applications is this device suited for?
Answer:
The voice HMI ASSP is suitable to control home appliances, air conditioners, smart panels, toys, gadgets, and many other user-controlled systems.
Suitable Products
RISC-V Voice ASSP
